text: Placodiscus bracteosus is a species of plant in the family Sapindaceae. It is found in Ivory Coast and Ghana. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Hawthorne, W. 1998. Placodiscus bracteosus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. bracteosus Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Placodiscus bracteosus
